adjectives.description: plesiomorphic (comparative more plesiomorphic, superlative most plesiomorphic)

entries.meaning: (cladistics) Sharing a character state with an ancestral clade; primitive.
examples: [T]he cockroach Polyphaga may represent a condition more plesiomorphic than in other Dictyoptera, but it could as well be paedomorphic, and therefore more derived than in other Dictyoptera [72].
